name: Aggro Coin
description: Collect the Aggro-Coins to gain points as you travel through the maze in this spaced out game as you squash the slimes through each level. How many coins can you collect before the slimes get the better of YOU! Enjoy. To move you can use W(Jump) A (Move Left) S (Move Backwards) D (Move Forward) you can also use the Arrow Keys and Space bar to jump or feel free to use a GamePad.
